mapper.select: /* BannerDao.selectSiteList */ SELECT SITEID , SITE_NM FROM TB_CMM_SITE WHERE SYS_SE_CD = 'U'

/* BannerDao.selectBannerInfo */ SELECT A.BANNERID , A.SITEID , A.BANNER_TTL , A.BANNER_FILEID , B.FILE_IDNTFC_KEY , B.ORGINL_FILE_NM , A.URL , A.EXPSR_YN , A.REG_DT FROM TB_CMM_BANNER A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_FILE B ON A.BANNER_FILEID = B.FILEID WHERE BANNERID = #{bannerid}
